t: Pep Boys Expands Tire Installation For Amazon.com Customers Nationally
s: November 16, 2018 - Pep Boys has announced it will take its Amazon.com Ship-to-Store tire installation program national. Customers can now choose their neighborhood Pep Boys for the fast, convenient and professional installation of any brand of tires they purchase on Amazon.com.
